descripcion: Estudiar sobre como funciona el sincronismo
Asistir a la clase de ingles y hacer la tarea
Probando si se graba en el json
Probando si se graba en el json con formato

When I was a young boy, my father took me into the city to see a marching band. He said, son when you grow up would you be the savior of the broken, the beaten and the damned? He said, will you defeat them, your demons, and all the non-believers, the plans that they have made? Because one day I'll leave you a phantom, to led you in the summer to join the black parade
